Package br.net.heaven.lavi.morphology.inflect

Class DeclensedItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.net.heaven.lavi.morphology.inflect.DeclensedItem
  • public class DeclensedItem
extends java.lang.Object

    Holds the declensed item attributes.

    Author:
    almir jr.

        Parameters:
        noun - The noun to be declensed
        nounCase - The case in which it will be declensed
        plurality - The plurality in which it will be declensed
